QuestData.Title: Return to Karazhan: Clearing Out the Cobwebs
QuestData.Description: I admit it... even as a spirit, I am deathly afraid of spiders. All those legs! Dripping fangs! Sticky webs coming out of their...$b$b<Darius does a squirming sort of shimmy that is uncomfortable to watch.>$b$bI'm sure a world-saving hero like you doesn't mind them, though. Which is good, since a whole brood of spiders has taken over the Servant's Quarters.$b$bYou'll handle this, right? If you don't get them all, they'll keep multiplying.
QuestData.LogDescription: Clean out spiders from the Servant's Quarters.
